name: cod
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 a large sea fish that can be eaten, or the meat of this fish: My son went out in the boat and caught a five-pound cod. Cod and chips, please. Synonym
codfish
TS Photography/Photographer's Choice/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesA whole fleet of fishing vessels trawl these waters for cod.We asked for two portions of cod and chips.For this recipe you need a kilo of white fish, such as cod or plaice.Cod is delicious, full of protein and low in fat, so it's an excellent food.

COMMERCE abbreviation for cash on delivery or collect on delivery: used to mean that payment will be made when goods are delivered: The goods will be shipped to you COD. a COD package
